ProductInfo.Features:
Video Output : 1 channel BNC, 1 channel SPOT, 1 channel VGA (1280 x 1024), 1 channel HDMI (1920 x 1080)
Playback : 1ch, 4ch, 8ch, 16ch simultaneously (playback channel options)
Adopts the standard H.264 compression technology, support 16channel recording, Network transmission,and playback simultaneously
Supports 16 channel audio input and 1 channel audio output
Support multiplex operation: live, record, playback, backup, network transmission, mobile phone surveillance
ProductInfo.Name: 16 Channel CCTV Security Surveillance Standalone H.264 DVR w/ HDMI port, DVD-RW, Internet Access, iPhone, Blackberry, Android Phone View
